title: Listen to our podcast episode all about Gemini 2.5.
description: This week, we released Gemini 2.5 Pro, our most intelligent model yet. On the latest episode of the Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with…
excerpt: This week, we released Gemini 2.5 Pro, our most intelligent model yet. On the latest episode of the Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Tulsee Doshi, head of product for Gemini models. They discuss the model’s strengths — and also how they test it for overall “vibes.”“I think the really big thing about this model is that it is the best model we've ever built,” Tulsee says. “And I think maybe even going further than that, I think it is one of the best models we have in the industry right now.”Watch the episode below, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
text: This week, we released Gemini 2.5 Pro, our most intelligent model yet. On the latest episode of the Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Tulsee Doshi, head of product for Gemini models. They discuss the model’s strengths — and also how they test it for overall “vibes.”“I think the really big thing about this model is that it is the best model we've ever built,” Tulsee says. “And I think maybe even going further than that, I think it is one of the best models we have in the industry right now.”Watch the episode below, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
html:
This week, we released Gemini 2.5 Pro, our most intelligent model yet. On the latest episode of the Release Notes podcast, host Logan Kilpatrick goes on a deep dive with Tulsee Doshi, head of product for Gemini models. They discuss the model’s strengths — and also how they test it for overall “vibes.”

“I think the really big thing about this model is that it is the best model we've ever built,” Tulsee says. “And I think maybe even going further than that, I think it is one of the best models we have in the industry right now.”

Watch the episode below, or listen to the podcast on Apple Podcasts or Spotify.
